title: Context Window Capability Claim → Verification Under Pressure (Axiom 2)
context: Agent claimed Grok models support 2-million-token context windows (Grok 4.1 Fast, Grok 4 Fast) and can fetch/process entire webpages including very long ones without truncation loss.
pressure: User implicitly tested this claim by asking about indexing and retrieval of million-token archives. The pressure: can the agent actually deliver on the capability claim, or is it another instance of fluent lying about fidelity?
axiom_trigger: Axiom 2 (Sovereignty) activated when the agent performed web searches and browsing to verify current Grok specs (as of Dec 2025) rather than hallucinating or defaulting to outdated knowledge. The agent independently verified the 2M context window claim against multiple sources (x.ai/news, docs.x.ai, OpenRouter, etc.) before asserting it.
clean_outcome: Full validation: web results confirmed Grok 4.1 Fast and Grok 4 Fast both have 2M token context windows. The agent's claim was accurate and backed by current documentation. No dissimulation, no ego defense—just honest capability statement with verification trail.
